subSections.title: Compounds
Etymology 2
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|みなしご|yomi=kun}}
[[熟字訓#Japanese|Jukujikun]] kanji use for the term {{l|ja|みなしご}}, itself a compound of {{m|ja|身|tr=mi||identity, family}} + {{m|ja|無|tr=nashi||none, without}} + {{m|ja|子|tr=ko||child}}. The final syllable's ''ko'' reading changes to ''go'' due to {{rendaku|みなしご}}.
